summary: In a French village, Manou is an Italian logger, virile, with a broad laugh. He can't say no to women's sexual invitations, and jealous villagers blame him for recent fires and a flood. He ... See full summary »

Chevallier|Valerie Girodias|René Hell|Claire Ifrane|Robert Larcebeau|Charles Lavialle|Laure Paillette|Catherine Parquier|Denise Péronne|Annie Savarin
title: Mademoiselle
